companies.name: Quantinuum
red_flags: Valuation pace: $5.3B â†’ $10.6B in 18 months (high expectations)
Quantum computing market timing uncertain
Competitive intensity from IonQ M&A, Google research
key_strengths: Fortune 500 customers: Amgen, BMW, JPMorgan Chase, SoftBank
Helios product launched Nov 2025 with 48 error-corrected logical qubits
Strategic investors: NVIDIA, JPMorgan, Fidelity, Honeywell (54% owner)
companies.notes: Entry via Firmament (Dillon, March 2020), before Hyperion founding. #2 by absolute value, #1 by MOIC among researched companies.

companies.name: Figure AI
red_flags: $39B valuation for pre-revenue company (minimal deployment: 1 robot)
CEO promotional claims vs. operational reality discrepancy
Gap: current state (1 robot) vs. projections (100K over 4 years)
key_strengths: First-mover: BMW deployment before Tesla Optimus
Exceptional fundraising: $2B from Microsoft, NVIDIA, Bezos, Intel
Founder track record: Brett Adcock (Vettery $110M exit, Archer $2.7B IPO)
companies.customer_traction: Pilot - Single robot at BMW Spartanburg plant
companies.notes: #1 by absolute value ($3.76M), #1 by MOIC (94x) in portfolio. Sourced via Tamarack Global (April 2023 Series A).

companies.name: Scout AI
red_flags: Seed round projected Q1 '24 NOT publicly announced (1 year overdue)
Minimal public presence after 2 years (no press, no customer names)
Tiny team (7 people), limited execution capacity
Severe external validation gaps
key_strengths: AI prospecting is growing market segment
companies.customer_traction: Pilot - Referrals claimed, but no named customers
companies.notes: Combined 2 rounds: Pre-Seed 1 ($3.3M) + Pre-Seed 2 ($7.5M). Concerning lack of seed round materialization.

companies.name: Natrion
red_flags: CRITICAL: Expected $60M-$100M GM deal did NOT materialize
Funding shortfall: Only $4.4M raised in 2024 vs. $60M-$100M projection (93% shortfall)
Major catalyst failure calls into question commercial viability
companies.customer_traction: Production - Air Force contracts, commercial orders
companies.notes: Major red flag: Projected breakthrough deal with GM did not happen. Funding trajectory concerning.

companies.name: Hephaestus
red_flags: Timeline discrepancy: Investment date (July 2023) precedes pre-seed announcement (Sept 2023)
Expected $40M-$50M raise (Q1 '24) did not materialize
Long commercialization timelines (fusion industry 5-10+ years)
key_strengths: AI simulation for fusion (addresses capital intensity of physical testing)
companies.customer_traction: No customers - Imperial College partnership claimed
companies.notes: Very early stage. Simulation software, not actual fusion reactor. Timeline/funding discrepancies warrant investigation.

companies.name: Innerworks
key_strengths: Production customers: 1inch partnership, national infrastructure pilots
AI fraud detection is emerging high-growth market
companies.notes: Solid execution. Commercial traction with named customers. Cybersecurity tailwinds from AI fraud threats.

companies.name: Biofire
red_flags: Production capacity constraints (12-16 month delivery backlog)
Gun owner skepticism of electronics remains significant
Unproven long-term reliability (no independent testing)
key_strengths: Biometric smart gun addresses safety concerns
companies.customer_traction: Pilot - Thousands of preorders, early shipments
companies.notes: Product-market fit validated by demand. Execution challenge: scaling production to meet backlog.

companies.name: Emerge
red_flags: No public evidence of Apple/Meta acquisition interest (dataroom claim unverified)
VR/AR market headwinds (Meta losses, Apple Vision Pro slow adoption)
Product still in limited beta/early deployment
companies.notes: Combined 2 rounds: Jun-23 ($65M) + Jan-24 ($30M). Strategic exit thesis (Apple/Meta) unverified.

companies.name: Dirac
red_flags: Funding discrepancy: dataroom $6M vs. public $10.7M seed
Customer claims (Anduril, Stellantis, Lockheed) unverified
First-time founder with limited operating experience
key_strengths: Ancra case study demonstrates value proposition
AI for manufacturing optimization is growing segment
companies.customer_traction: Pilot - Ancra verified, other pilots claimed
companies.notes: Siemens partnership provides credibility. Customer claims need independent verification.

companies.name: Marathon Fusion
red_flags: Extremely early stage (founded 2023, technology unproven at scale)
Dependent on fusion commercialization (5-10+ years minimum)
Gold transmutation dual revenue model is simulation-only, not validated
companies.customer_traction: No customers - Letters of Intent only
companies.notes: Very early stage. Long timeline to commercialization. Dependent on broader fusion industry success.

companies.name: Normal Computing
red_flags: Funding discrepancy: dataroom claims $17M Series A (April 2024) not found publicly
Fortune 500 customer claims unverified (no independent validation)
Thermodynamic computing is experimental technology (performance unproven)
key_strengths: Thermodynamic computing is novel approach to energy-efficient AI
If technology works, addresses critical AI power consumption problem
companies.notes: Major data discrepancy: Series A designation vs. public seed round record. Requires verification.

companies.name: Haiqu
red_flags: CRITICAL: 2-year timeline mismatch between dataroom (June 2025 $10M seed) and public sources (June 2023 $4M pre-seed)
Major data discrepancy requires immediate verification
Limited public evidence of customer traction
key_strengths: Quantum software is important market segment
companies.customer_traction: No customers - Pilots claimed but unverified
companies.notes: CRITICAL DATA ISSUE: 2-year timeline discrepancy between dataroom and public sources. Must verify.

companies.name: Mesh Optical
red_flags: Extremely early stage (only 9 months post-incorporation, Feb 2025)
No public funding disclosed despite capital-intensive business model
First-time founder with unproven commercial experience
Stealth mode limits ability to assess
key_strengths: Data center optics is high-growth market (AI infrastructure demand)
companies.notes: Too early to assess. Stealth mode. Minimal public information. High uncertainty.
